message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $1,050,000 for your product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,050,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. This still leaves a good margin for both of us. What do you say?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but based on my financial constraints, I can only offer $1,075,000 for your product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
